name: Bangalore International Airport (BIAL) - Primary No-Fly Zone
description: Kempegowda International Airport restricted airspace. No drones permitted within 5km radius.

name: HAL Aerospace Complex - Military No-Fly Zone
description: Hindustan Aeronautics Limited (HAL) aerospace facility in Whitefield. Highly restricted airspace.

name: INS Ashoka Naval Base - Military No-Fly Zone
description: Indian Navy training establishment in Bangalore. Restricted airspace for all UAVs.

name: Yelahanka Air Force Station - Military No-Fly Zone
description: Indian Air Force station in North Bangalore. High security restricted area.

name: Parliament House Area - Government No-Fly Zone
description: Legislative Assembly of Karnataka and high-security government buildings. No-fly zone.

name: Vidhana Soudha Complex - Government No-Fly Zone
description: State secretariat and government offices. Highly restricted airspace.

name: Bangalore Fort Area - Heritage No-Fly Zone
description: Historic monument and government offices. No-fly zone for heritage protection.

name: Central Business District - Downtown Bangalore
description: High-density commercial area with tall buildings. Use caution - low altitude operations not recommended.

name: Whitefield IT Hub - Congested Tech Zone
description: Dense IT corridor with multiple office buildings. Limited airspace - maintain altitude above 300m.

name: Koramangala Residential Area
description: High-density residential and commercial zone. Sensitive area - operations above 200m recommended.

name: MG Road - High Traffic Commercial Zone
description: Major commercial thoroughfare with dense pedestrian and vehicular traffic. Exercise caution.

name: Indiranagar Lake - Scenic/Recreational Area
description: Lake and park area suitable for drone operations. Open airspace - operational zone.

name: Cubbon Park - Central Recreation Area
description: Large urban park in city center. Operational zone with open airspace for delivery drones.

name: Majestic Transport Hub Zone
description: Major transport interchange area. Operational zone with monitored airspace.

name: Electronic City IT Park - Industrial Zone
description: Major IT and industrial park. Operational zone for light delivery operations.

name: Mysore Road Industrial Corridor
description: Industrial and warehouse zone south of Bangalore. Suitable for drone deliveries.

name: Hinjewadi Tech Park - Pune Nearby
description: IT park in Pune area (nearby Bangalore region). Operational delivery zone.

name: Bengaluru Tech Park - Outer Ring Road
description: IT and tech corridor on outer ring road. Operational delivery zone with moderate traffic.

name: Hebbal Lake - Water Body No-Fly Zone
description: Water body with restricted airspace. Cannot operate over water for safety reasons.

name: Sankey Tank - Water Body No-Fly Zone
description: Water reservoir in central Bangalore. No-fly zone for water safety.

name: Bannerghatta National Park - Ecological Zone
description: National park south of Bangalore. Wildlife conservation area - limited operations permitted.

name: Central Silk Board Area - Industrial Zone
description: Silk industry and manufacturing zone. Operational for delivery drones.

name: Bellandur Tech Corridor - IT Zone
description: Major IT and commercial corridor in East Bangalore. Operational delivery zone.

name: Sarjapur Road Residential - Caution Zone
description: Developing residential corridor. Moderate traffic and population density.
